main event: A series of UFO sightings reported in Phoenix, Arizona in 1952, involving multiple witnesses and a variety of observations including a large flying wing-shaped object with glowing windows and slow, hovering movements.
interesting points: Object was seen by multiple individuals, adding credibility to the sightings.
The object had a dull gray bottom with a series of orange glowing windows.
It traveled at the speed of a jet aircraft and was observed hovering occasionally, then ascending rapidly into cloud coverage.
The witness noted that the object did not resemble any known aircraft of the time and expressed uncertainty about its nature.
No physical evidence or photographs were available to support the sightings.
sighted object: large flying wing-shaped object with orange glowing windows
